item.title: Top Telegram-Based Bot Airdrops 2024
item.description: Airdrops have become a popular method for distributing free tokens to the crypto community, serving as an effective marketing strategy for new projects. Recently, Telegram-based bots have gained traction for hosting these airdrops, allowing users to earn tokens conveniently through the messaging app. Here are some of the top Telegram-based bot airdrops that offer unique opportunities to engage with the crypto space: Hamster Kombat Hamster Kombat is a widely popular Telegram-based game with over 150 million players.
